# orion-checkbox-group

Checkbox group is a component that controls layout of a group of checkboxes. Use in conjunction with `orion-label`, `orion-error` and `orion-note` components.

Additional documentation available at [orion.united.com](https://orion.united.com/)

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                             | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disable all checkboxes in group         | `boolean` | `false` |
| `inline`   | `inline`   |  The inline state of the checkbox group | `boolean` | `false` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                | Description                                                                                                  |
| ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `--orion-checkbox-group-column-gap` | value of the column-gap property. Default is 56px. Inline group only displays for desktop (769px and above). |
